# goop-shield-community

## Overview
Runtime defense for AI agents providing prompt injection blocking, data exfiltration detection, and jailbreak prevention through 24 inline defenses and 3 output scanners.

## Key Capabilities
- Prompt injection detection and blocking
- Data exfiltration prevention
- Agent config guard (prevents config tampering)
- Canary token detection
- Rate limiting and behavioral monitoring

## Architecture
- 24 ranked inline defenses (mandatory + heuristic + crypto + content + behavioral)
- 3 output scanners (secret leak, canary leak, harmful content)
- Deployment modes: HTTP API server, MCP server, Python SDK
- Framework adapters: LangChain, CrewAI, OpenClaw

## MCP Server Integration
First-class Model Context Protocol support for Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Cline, Roo Code.
Exposes tools: shield_defend, shield_scan, shield_health, shield_config

## Installation
pip install goop-shield-community          # Core
pip install goop-shield-community[mcp]     # With MCP server
pip install goop-shield-community[all]     # All dependencies
